reviews.comment: The jollof rice is absolutely amazing! Reminds me of home. Best Nigerian restaurant in Lagos!
Their egusi soup is the best I've ever tasted. The pounded yam is always fresh and smooth. Highly recommend!
Great food, great service! The suya is perfectly spiced and the portions are generous. Will definitely order again!
Love the variety of food options. The pastries are always fresh and the grilled fish is outstanding!
Best buka in the area! Authentic Nigerian food at affordable prices. The customer service is top-notch too!

carouselImages.alt: Delicious Jollof rice with grilled chicken
